name: Laser Defender (RavenDev)
description:
This is a space shooter game inspired by titles like Galaga and Space Invaders. The alien ships will come in waves form top or bottom of the screen at the rhythm of the music. After each level you can upgrade some stats using your score points as credits, but these will be deducted form the final score! There are only 3 levels, average playtime is 8 minutes. Enjoy!

I started this project as a personal prototype while I was learning to use Unity following a tutorials on www.GameDev.tv
I decided to continue developing the game as a School Project, add my own features without looking at a sept by step guide. I used books like Game Programming Patterns and Unity Game Development Cookbook: Essentials for Every Game.

The 2D assets are from Space Shooter Redux on https://www.kenney.nl/

The music I used was form Juhani Junkala
